body_html:
It's close to recordio, but it is actually "tfrecord" It has a few differences from recordio so a standard recordio reader won't work.

If you want to write events without using the python api, you should use the tensorflow::EventsWriter class, like tatatodd suggested.

Please feel free to submit a pull request improving the documentation :)

Please feel free to submit a pull request improving the documentation :)
body:
It's close to recordio, but it is actually "tfrecord" It has a few differences from recordio so a standard recordio reader won't work.

If you want to write events without using the python api, you should use the tensorflow::EventsWriter class, like tatatodd suggested. 

Please feel free to submit a pull request improving the documentation :)
